column4: PLEASE HELP: Linksys EG1032 v3 gigabit NIC on hoary, see's it as device but doesn't show up in Networking panel (no connection)
Find the required modiule (google) and load it.
Then it might simply not be supported
it's based on the natsemi 83820 chipset, which means that it needs ns83820, i modprobed it, lsmoded to make sure it loaded, and nothing
it loaded OK? Did it show up in 'dmesg' ?
i don't know if it shows up in dmesg
lets asume that it loads with no problem, i'm dual booting win/linux and i have to be in windows for NIC to work (now) and to check a single thing would require two reboots
if it loads OK, there will be an 'ethX: natsemi ... ' log message in dmesg.
ok i'll be back after i check
dmesg does not return eth0 etc etc, it returns ns83820.c: NatSemi 10/100/1000 DP83820 etc
